gonaddha：gonaddha（na）
ဂေါနဒ္ဓ（န）
gonaddha，godha.
ဂေါနဒ္ဓမြို့၊ ဂေါဓမြို့။

Gonaddha：One of the places passed by Bāvarī’s disciples on their way from Bāvarī’s hermitage to see the Buddha at Rājagaha．

Between Gonaddha and their starting place lay Patitthāna，Māhissati andUjjeni，and the next stopping place after Gonaddha was Vedisā．（Sn.vs.1011）．

The Commentary （SnA.ii.583） says that Gonaddha was another name for Godhapura.

gonaddha：ဂေါနဒ္ဓ（န）

ဂေါနဒ္ဓမြို့၊ ဂေါဓမြို့။
